short_description: "Dovetail's partnership has been a key ingredient in taking Uncommon from three person start up to the company we are today.
long_description: "Dovetail's partnership has been a key ingredient in taking Uncommon from three person start up to the company we are today. As a result their whole team genuinely care about what we are building together. They have maintained a great level of support over the past six years for which we are very grateful.
